ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] selling D2 acct. hoooow?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, same dam pike like mine.  Hmm wat ornate armor u using now?  Maybe I can pass u one of my collection so tat u can sell for better price. Remember to let me
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, same dam pike like mine. Hmm wat ornate armor u using now? Maybe I
can pass u one of my collection so tat u can sell for better price.
Remember to let me know the market price for our barb after u check ebay
hor, thx ;)

As for helm, I'm using howltask, or taskhowl? can't remember. I need its
35% dam goes to mana ability, so if I kena caught in a grp of mob and mana
sucked dry, I still got a chance to jump out when some mob hit me and the
dam goes to mana, hehe. Boots wise I'm using rare, fastest run/walk with
resis. Btw, iceblink only 200-300ac? How to survive hell 4 with tat kinda
ac??? My jewel no change, 7%mana amulet + mana, 6% hp ring, dual steal
ring. Same +19 str war belt, fastest recovery, resis etc. I got 2 mules
holding uniques, too many liao, hehe.

How abt zan now? Btw, why make 1 main char per acct, so expensive, hehe.
I can only afford to play with 1 acct lah, hehehe

Zil


On Friday, 06 October, 2000 3:57 PM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...]
wrote:

gloves,

server

the

they
> got lvl 80+ char :P
> Im usually in "D2 singapore" channel. the "singapore" channel sux .
>
> Hokkien(d2) aka Bibi(eq)aka Aka(RL)
